website_summaries.verdict: A good option for those looking for a bodywash to help with keratosis pilaris and body acne.
pros: This sulfate-free bodywash has glycolic and salicylic acid to exfoliate and improve bumps and acne
Contains aloe vera, gotu kola, and vitamin E to soothe and moisturize
cons: Pretty pricey and may be too harsh for those with very sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Not a miraculous cure
customer_reviews.text: It actually helps to improve the appearance of keratosis but not as I expected ... there’s not a miraculous cure. I’ve been using it 3 weeks and I’ve seen a slight improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Iza Romero

customer_reviews.title: Improvements
customer_reviews.text: I use this soap in conjunction with a Salux body cloth I bought on Amazon in order to combine physical and chemical exfoliation. I believe both have played equal roles in GREATLY declining the redness from my KP, and helping to get my pores smoothing. Bumps are still able to be felt, but are much less visible and overall this soap improved my skin health. Will be buying the lotion when it’s back in stock. I love Touch! I can’t believe I paid for 60$ wipes from my dermatologist that didn’t even work, when these two products work so well!! Great light scent too.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is such a life saver! Everyone who has KP knows how annoying it can be to deal with it. You have to keep it on for a few minutes while in the shower for it to work effectively. I noticed a difference within a few days. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: celeste001

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! It does in fact take very little and the lather is very soft and luxurious! My skin was so soft after my shower that I was really surprised! A product that delivers! Who'd think? I used it on my face and got the same result...extremely soft skin with no burning. The one problem I had, and it was my error, was I got a bit in my eyes. It burned a bit, but I was able to rinse it out and everything was fine, just watch that you stay clear of your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: ASchoolGal

customer_reviews.title: It works - I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to cut down on clogged pores - not for keratosis pilaris. It has worked. It can be drying so you might not want to use this every day.
customer_reviews.author: Anaeee

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Keratosis Pilaris since I was a child and I am now 33. This is the first product that has ever given me noticeable results. I have been using it for about 2 weeks now and while the bumps are not gone completely I have seen about a 75% improvement in my condition so far. My skin is nearly smooth for the first time! I use the Body Wash Cleanser twice a week along with the exfoliating lotion daily. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who struggles with KP.
customer_reviews.author: jen17351

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Glytone
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Glytone facial cleanser before they changed there formula. I don't like there new stuff a I wanted something that was close to the old stuff. This is it. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Big difference
customer_reviews.text: For years now I have really bad kp on my chest,shoulders and back. I have been using the body wash plus the lotion for a couple of weeks and there is a huge difference. I finally can wear a v neck shirt and short sleeve shirts. My skin feels really soft. I tried many different treatments. I think this is the best for me and I ll keep using it. It also smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: sandra bissonnette

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I used as instructed on the bottles. I purchased body wash and lotion because I had hope this was going work since there were so many good reviews. I'm not so certain it helped with anything at all to be honest because I did use this everyday with a lufa and lotion right after I got out of the shower. I feel like I would of got the same result of the smoothness with any body wash and lotion. I would not recommend this item to anyone that has keratosis pilaris
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Used for a month with zero change. Used photos to track the total lack of change. Too late to return do I will finish out the bottle just in case month 2 makes s difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! I saw results within the next few days. My arms felt much smoother! After about a month of use I have a few patches left on my arm but nothing like before. Be patient because it does take time. I wish I would have taken before pictures, these are just after. The red marks are the patches that are left
customer_reviews.author: anai

customer_reviews.title: Loved This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the exfoliating lotion as well and i really didn't expect it to work that well! Excuse the gross picture of my legs but the before picture is from May 9th and the after picture is from June 26th. I haven't even been using it everyday. Only thing i would suggest is making a scentless option for people with extra sensitive skin like mine, scented body wash always makes me break out/itch a bit on my arms. Overall a great product and the only thing thats worked for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyann Clark

customer_reviews.title: it really works!
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time buying this product I have suffer from Keratosis Pilaris since I was a little kid, but when I grew up, it got worst I have it all my arms, a little on my stomach, and a little bit on my back and legs. You can definitely see a difference in 1 week or less if you use it constantly, you skin feels really soft, I had never felt my skin that soft. but then I stopped using it for like 1 or 2 weeks and my skin started feeling and looking bad again, in conclusion this product it does work but you have to keep using it if you want to keep the results.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had KP on arms and more recently on my butt and it is embarrassing and persistent. I tried scrubs, Amlactin, dry brushing, exfoliating, etc. After using once you can actually feel smoother skin because it has removed some of the dead upper layer. Recommend using with a scrub brush. If you have extremely sensitive skin, this might be too strong for you. However, nothing seems to work on my hearty skin so this was a breakthrough for me. Sometimes I will leave it on about 30 seconds and then gently scrub. Highly recommend for stubborn KP
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rosinski

customer_reviews.title: Next Level Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I believe the skin is reflective of ones inner health and care. It’s the largest organ of the body and it’s surface is the 1st line of defense against toxins in our environment. Touch KP body wash takes that defense to the next level! My skin is buttery soft, smooth texture, hyperpigmentation has lifted, tightened pores and I glow with a visible luminescence. I love my skin!! You must not pass this opportunity to invest in Touch KP Body Wash......... and YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Owens

customer_reviews.title: I must have industrial strength skin...
customer_reviews.text: This is just regular body wash for me. I don't have KP but as hoping to lighten some dark spots by exfoliating with a strong GA wash followed by the accompanying lotion. It's been 4 months of daily use and nothing. Now I would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: T-MAC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results in less than two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with KP my entire life and spent probably thousands of dollars on any number of remedies. I used Dermadoctor KP Duty for years with fair to middling results, among many other products, including prescription creams. I've NEVER had such dramatic results as I've had using this cleanser and the accompanying lotion. I really wish I'd taken before pictures so I could show the world the difference these products have made in the KP on my arms. I'm in absolute shock, and will most definitely continue to use these products!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader Mama

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely surprised this worked.
customer_reviews.text: I've had KP on the back of my arms for 16 years, nothing I tried ever worked to fix it. Got tired of it finally and decided to look for some sort of miracle cure on Amazon and I found it. Been using consistently (1-2 times per day in the shower) for a month now and I'd say my arms are 75% cleared up. You do have to scrub pretty intensely for it to work (I bought the Coolife scrubber suggested with it), and yes it hurts, but the end result is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: senorencurtido

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from ingrown leg hairs as well as minor KP and no matter I have tried nothing has ever worked, until now. Everything you can think I have tried and nothing has ever worked. I ordered this body wash & the matching lotion just to try one last thing and holy actual magic in a bottle. I use this soap then use the witchtrash carnelian shave soap to shave and it has changed my whole life. A few hours after shaving I apply the lotion and honestly my skin has never looked or felt better! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and probably not compatible with all sensitive skin types
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work for me. Was using CeraVe SA body wash but there was no stock so opted to try this. My skin is most sensitive around my neck and I would break out into a rash every time I used this product. For me this product is three times the price of CeraVe SA and really not worth it if not compatible with your skin. This was a massive waste of money for me. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Clint M. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who has PSOS and the keratosis build ups on her arms. She has been using it for only a week and has seen significant improvement she wore a T-shirt without a jacket to cover her arms! This is a big deal, trust me! I only bought the scrub and the moisturizer. I hope it works for you! Definitely deserves the benefit of any doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best KP Body Wash! Your Legs Will Look Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best body wash for KP! This is my second bottle and I don’t foresee myself stopping using this. I’ve lived with KP my entire life and this product has helped me so much. My legs will typically have red bumps all over with hair follicles waiting to be released, but when I use this body wash + my fav body lotion (I personally use Lilah James KP Exfoliating Lotion) my legs look and feel sooo much better. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy A

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy and will buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.text: Started to get hot outside and I wear suits. I was starting breakout so I stumbled upon this product. I’ve been using it and it works well. You can feel it work. Haven’t had a breakout since, it’s been many weeks now. This is one product for face wash that I actually can tell works. I’m not on the extreme end but would casually break out with one or two really good ones, big enough where you could name them. It also helps on my neck after shaving. I’m manly man but super sensitive skin, this helped with razor burn on the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Scoops8464

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great great product. Pricey enough for the quality but I found a cheaper brand that did the same work for a third of the price.
customer_reviews.author: surfsacha

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: There's not been a visible difference to the KP on upper arms, but it has helped top of thighs. Sad about that, but better than other products tried. Daily use during autumnal and winter weather has proven unwise- the general dryness of the air combined with the active ingredients caused a rash on inner biceps. Switching to alternate days cleared it up. So just be observant!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! Definite results! 👍🏻👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff!! Really does help a lot with minimizing and eliminating those annoying pesky little arm bumps and redness I get. Would certainly recommend! :) Make sure to get a really good lather going when you use it & rub it in well/ for a few minutes and then rinse off. Don't apply or get on any open cuts or scrapes, because it will definitely cause burning. Ouch. Great stuff! I buy this continuously now! ☺️😁👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: becky evans

customer_reviews.title: You will love
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this by the gallon if I could, with a pump. Amazing product if you have dry aging skin or just want softer skin. The only criticism I have is that it’s hard to squeeze a pump type bottle would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad KP from the back of my arms down to my wrist. I have noticed my skin getting smoother and the bumps going away slowly. This is the first product where I have seen positive progress.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ! It works !!!
customer_reviews.text: I has been fighting again my KP for years , and I was tired of everything I used with no results . I decided to give a chance to this product because of the reviews , and yes !! It is good !! It works !! After years now I noticed the difference on my KP . It is not cheap but with only small amount everyday you will have excellent results
customer_reviews.author: yovani pinero

customer_reviews.title: Not sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think to look at ingredients but most people w kp, such as myself, have sensitive skin and fragrance can be harsh on skin.. not sure if that’s it but this really caused irritation and made my kp bumps smooth but very red which looked horrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made KP worse
customer_reviews.text: This product was really disappointing. I was using just as prescribed, with an exfoliator, and twice a day. I noticed instead of improving my skin, it made it appear worse. My bumps became more red and pronounced. I used it for a month hoping it would get better but it didn’t. I have stopped using it and my bumps have gone down and are not as a red. Do not recommend for anyone struggling with KP.
customer_reviews.author: Manuella Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Improvements within a week
customer_reviews.text: I use it for hyperpigmentation and this has lightened some spots very quickly with the lotion as well. I've only had it for a week so to validate seeing results in 30 days is very plausible. I'll definitely be ordering this again once it runs out. The only con is that I don't see this lasting for a month. I'd say 3 weeks max using an adequate amount and I only use it once a day but you definitely get the bang for your buck. It simply does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: S.P

customer_reviews.title: Softest skin I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to make a difference, but after a few weeks of alternating this with a moisturizing cleanser and using an argan oil lotion, my skin is perfectly smooth. My arms haven’t felt like this since elementary school, it’s like I’ve got my baby skin back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Negrete

customer_reviews.title: Good at clearing blemishes and ingrown hairs
customer_reviews.text: This wash is good for discoloration and ingrown hair/razor burn. Just make sure you don't manually exfoliate or dry brush first or you are going to be furiously splashing on cold water.
customer_reviews.author: T-Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Is it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’ve thought long and hard about this review and purchasing this product again. While I think it’s excellent, it should be noted that addressing KP takes a variety of different measures and products (I exfoliate, use a KP lotion, shave regularly, . So there’s no REAL way for me to know if it’s the main factor of my diminishing KP. And at $30 a pop for a product I use liberally everyday I’m not sure. I will continue to shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Sola

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: To be 100% transparent- my kp was not that bad BUT bad enough that I stopped wearing shorts this summer. Now after less than a week , I feel confident to wear them again! Plus my skin is brighter and my tattoos seem fresher as well! Definitely will be repurchasing. I also bought the companion moisturizer- I strongly suggest that you purchase both. The company goes above and beyond to make sure you are pleased with your purchase. They also give you tips on how to get the most out of their product.
customer_reviews.author: MEP

customer_reviews.title: Made my KP worse.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 0 stars if I could, don't buy this don't use this get away from this. It made my KP much worse. It made my skin extremely sensitive and itchy, and my skin literally hurt from this. You're doing more damage than good, just do home remedies. Using this product made me even more self conscious with my skin and 3 weeks later I barely recovered. The product says you can't be in the sun for one week, that itself should show how it isn't good for your skin. The chemicals in it are harmful for your skin
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Towner

customer_reviews.title: Strong product, only need a little to make bumpy back of arms feel soft
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, I slathered on a generous amount and massaged it in for a couple of minutes. My skin felt dry after this, so I think it was too long. I waited a week, used a smaller amount, and didn't massage it in for as long, great result! Back of arms where I experience KP is now very soft. I was surprised I could get this result after minimal use. I will probably only use once per week so as to not overdry.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't help bumps from KP
customer_reviews.text: not worth buying. bumps on my thighs and arms are still there and red. the price is definitely NOT worth it if you've struggled with KP as long as I have and I'm 24. haven't been able to find a product that works and continues to work after long periods of time. regret buying it but was hopeful after reading positive reviews
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Clears up my skin issues finally!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Day 2 after my first time using this my redness from keratosis pilaris had calmed down wasn’t red, and both my arms and legs were back to normal. My skin isn’t dry and itchy any longer. I immediately put on lotion as you recommended. My 2nd shower 3 days later using both showed even greater skin improvement. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Truly Amamzing I have suffered from KP my whole life. After having my two kids my KP started to spread down to my lower arms and my upper arms got severely worse. So I decided to purchase this along with the lotion and coollife ingrown hair remover [green scrub brush]. In 1 week there was a huge difference. And now 1 month later I have 80% clearer skin. My lower arms are completely clear and my upper arms are getting better with every use :)
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for KP
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product for seb derm because my dermatologist told me to look for something with glycolic acid in it to treat my condition. I also have KP and it's done wonders for both conditions. I've even used it on my head and it's great. I used it everyday for a couple of months but have decreased it to every other day. I love this product. It has done wonders for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shortlegs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I waited forever for this to be back in stock. I love this body wash! It’s really helped clear up my arms. I only leave 4 stars instead of 5 because the top on mine does not open the way it should. I have to unscrew the top in order to used it. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jessica buza

customer_reviews.title: Great wash!!
customer_reviews.text: I do feel it's exfoliating my body well! It's not strong stuff I think but I definitely feel cleaner and love how it lathers - a little can go quite a long way. Bottle looks and feels great too. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So I been using this for over a month now and I really noticed much of a difference in my skin honestly. There is no scent but I love that because so many others have such a strong scent its overwhelming
customer_reviews.author: krristen j.

customer_reviews.title: Helped my KP somewhat, but not enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the lotion to try to get rid of some of my KP. It definitely helped to make my arms smoother, but the red circles are still very present. This may work for you though; everyone is different. The scent is light and this didn't irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: maria boustani

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Even with just one use it reduces the bumps on my legs. I first got the lotion and it was working great, but I don't always remember to put it on. So I thought to get the body wash because it would be easier to add into a routine and it works great. I also have skin sensitivities and allergies and it's not bothered me at all in the months I have been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I used Glytone for many years and was very happy. Then I noticed a change in the packaging and formula. The packaging was great, the formula was disappointing. When scrolling through reviews, I read that some others were having the same experiences as me. Recognizing that it might be time to switch, I did just that based on reviews of this product. I'm as pleased now with Touch that I was with Glytone many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best soap I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: The good reviews were right. In one use my bumpy arms felt 90% better. I’ve tried all sorts of lotions before but never soap. This stuff is 100%
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 1 month, 70% improvement in arms, minimal in legs. Soft skin and last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: E. Zuluaga

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as Amalactin. Frankly, I liked the packaging and bottle and the Amalactin bottle looks medical.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I do have KP on my arms.I wouldn't say it's all vanished. But it has definitely gotten better. I use it everyday along with a moisturizer..
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Smells great and is helping with body acne.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have had no issues with this body wash irritating my skin. It's gentle and is helping with my body acne. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective!
customer_reviews.text: It worked in about 3 weeks. I had it on my arms and legs pretty bad. I would and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dicken

customer_reviews.title: It is nice, leaves skin very smooth. No residual residues.
customer_reviews.text: Still working with product, haven't used long enough to determine if will address the bums on right shoulder area.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Did Nothing for my skin
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try a more expensive brand of this type of an "acid" body wash, but it did not help with smoothness or redness. No scent which was good. Not impressed after two weeks of use, returned.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Results!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with the KP Exfoliating Lotion and I am so glad I did! I noticed a difference after the first use, and can barely feel my KP anymore after only using it a couple of weeks. My skin feels the best it's felt in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Cari Lynn

customer_reviews.title: No more acne bumps
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very natural. This product definitely suds with bubbles and everything. I have noticed that it does help with acne and redness. I was hoping it would help with dark marks but have not seen a difference in that. Overall a great product for sensitive skin and getting rid of body acne. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Too gentle.
customer_reviews.text: Felt like a spent too much money on something that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: English Major

customer_reviews.title: Let it sit on your skin for a couple mins
customer_reviews.text: I felt on imediate difference on my skin it felt cleaner. A little goes a long way so the product lasts a good amount of time. It doesnt lather but thats ok. I find it work better when i let it sit on my skin for a couple minutes before i wash it off. Overall great product and its reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Dia

customer_reviews.title: Great first start
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product a B+. My KP did not clear up entirely but it definitely diminished the look of my KP which is nice. I have suffered from KP from my teenage years to now my early 30s on my arms and legs and buttocks area. It is a great first start to try.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wardrobe

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly
customer_reviews.text: Right after the first use, my skin felt silky. I use this with the body lotion and my skin's texture has improved a lot in the first week.
customer_reviews.author: C J Moore

customer_reviews.title: worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I literally have never written a product review in my whole life, but I have struggled with breakouts on my back and chest for so long and this is the first product that really works! I've tried literally everything, and this stuff started working within a week! Definitely going to keep buying. and a lot goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gleerup

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow! I’ve had KP for more than 15 years and I wish I took before and after pictures I used this three times a week along with the lotion and my KP is basically gone! Now I just do maintenance maybe once or town a week. Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sidepo

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It seems to working after 1 week of use. I like this product a lot. I am using it for raised brown spots.
customer_reviews.author: lea

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I wrote advising that i was not seeing any results was told just to continue to use it. So I did and now come to find out I am past the date to return the product or receive a refund. Huge waste of time and more importantly money.
customer_reviews.author: CMH789

customer_reviews.title: Working on it......
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and I have KP. I started to use this product and have seen some improvement. I think with continued use it may disappear completely. My son is now using too, however, his is much worse than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Live this stuff! Smells good and works great to exfoliate the skin gently.
customer_reviews.author: Ncstategirl2011

customer_reviews.title: IT TRULY WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would 100% recommend this product to anyone that deals with KP, like myself,and have tried every product out there. I have been using this product since the day I received it in the mail(a few weeks now) and have seen GREAT results. I plan to order more as I run out!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Feesha N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My skin has never felt like normal skin soft and smooth, after adding this to my daily routine even my husband noticed the difference and ask me what I was doing different. I have given to my son and daughter who bother have rough and bumpy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Didnt help me at all..i dont understand why its amazon's favorite? I didnt saw any difference with my kp
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: It has made a difference in treating my daughter’s KP
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has seen a lot of improvement on her KP since she started using it
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't let this product be discontinued! It's literally the only thing that keeps my severe KP under control. I buy it on a monthly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Smooth legs 👌
customer_reviews.text: This body wash works! Has a gentle smell and a little goes a long way. It got rid off my bumps on my legs. Never had them this smooth.
customer_reviews.author: pems-integ-tests

customer_reviews.title: Clears b’acne!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this product! We used Glytone body wash for years for my sons acne. It seems Glytone has changed the formula, so we decided to give this a try! Works Wonders and so far we like it better than Glytone and it’s cheaper!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Santaliz

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had KP all my life. It’s not an extreme case, but very much there. Touch is the best cleanser I’ve found. You can’t change your skin, but it actively minimizes impact.
customer_reviews.author: AE1

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kp!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so smooth because of this! Very subtle fragrance. I have Kp on the booty and while that’s a skin type you can never get rid of, it does help with the texture and appearance of my skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Leaves you with smooth skin texture
customer_reviews.text: This was great for smoothing out bumps for KP, but my only wish is that it got rid of the appearance as well. Overall, pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Saldana Lara

customer_reviews.title: Skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had TENS (Toxic epidermal necrolysis syndrome) which left my skin in very bad shape. Since I have been using the Touch body wash I do see an improved overall appearance. It’s a bit pricey however a small amount goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia m brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this product
customer_reviews.text: I've had problems with dry skin all my life and haven't found anything that really helps. Vaseline gives you instant relief, but eventually the skin returns to it's dry state. This product has made a HUGE difference. If it keeps my skin from flaking during the winter months I may have to invest in the company!!!
customer_reviews.author: party lomax

customer_reviews.title: it works... so far
customer_reviews.text: After just two treatments I could see a big difference in the small bumps on my face. This is the only product I have tried to do that.
customer_reviews.author: S Bell

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt help me at all but I am happy it works for other people. I found that the lotions are better.
customer_reviews.author: Niamh Maddock

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had bumps on my upper arms for years. The first time I used this product I could feel and see a difference! I have been using this product just once a day and I’m no longer self conscious wearing a sleeveless top.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Avakian

customer_reviews.title: Take a leap of faith
customer_reviews.text: All of my life I’ve had kp and it’s gotten worse as I’ve gotten older, until now I do my regiment everyday and I’m seeing results. I couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Working well !
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to get rid of my KP and it has for sure smoothed my skin. Just waiting for the skin to actually clear up as well. Seems to be slowly. Good results I’m sure come with time.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a couple weeks now and I’m pretty satisfied with the results! I bought the moisturizer as well. Works good on acne too
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Black

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. After using it for 3 weeks it has my bumpy skin on my legs and arms sooo smooth. I totally recommend it for anyone that’s looking for smooth touchable skin.
customer_reviews.author: Samar Nassar

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for almost 2 months and I really haven’t noticed a lot of difference, I’m not sure if it’s because I’m not using enough but I haven’t noticed a huge difference
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: day 5 & doing a good job clearing my bumps & redness
customer_reviews.author: juan anthony

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up my keratosis pillaris within days!!! Have had rough bumps on my forehead for a year and someone recommended this product to me. Literally a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up my arms within a week & a half
customer_reviews.text: Lathers very well, cleared up my arms within a week & a half, gives that nice clean feeling
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Christian

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: It's been around almost a week of using this day and night; have been seeing some some gradual, yet effective results!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, it is a staple in my home.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wash, it is a great prep for a chemical peel. I could feel and see results immediately! Great for clearing up keratosis.
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.text: So far we have liked this product. It has helped with my 7 year olds bumpy skin...
customer_reviews.author: Kelleah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. Used glytone for years, gave this a try on a whim... will be a staple of mine!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hyperpigmentation
customer_reviews.text: I have nummular eczema and the dark scars have lightened since I started using this product. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: One week of showering with this stuff and all the little bumps on mt legs and arms are gone!
customer_reviews.author: martha leggett allen

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: She says finally something is working. I have noticed improvement too.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Batista

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if you have it!
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing for my eczema but sadly not affordable
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: IT Works Wonders!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about 2 weeks. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: C Durham

product_meta.title: Touch Keratosis Pilaris & Acne Exfoliating Body Wash Cleanser - KP Treatment with 15% Glycolic Acid, 2% Salicylic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid - Smooths Rough & Bumpy Skin - Gets Rid Of Redness, 8 Ounce
feature_bullets: EXFOLIATING BODY WASH FOR CLEAR SKIN: A foaming, sulfate free keratosis pilaris & acne body wash made with 15% glycolic acid and 2% salicylic acid, proven to exfoliate and clear your skin. Formulated with a pH of 3.5 to allow for more “free acids” to work on your skin. The Original KP Exfoliating Body Wash. No harmful beads or alcohols.

SMOOTH SKIN WITH NO REDNESS: Our Keratosis Pilaris treatment has two key ingredients: glycolic acid (AHA) that exfoliates away surface bumps and oil soluble salicylic acid (BHA) which goes deep into your pores and hair follicles to target the source of KP and acne, reducing inflammation and redness.

SKIN SOOTHING INGREDIENTS: Prevent irritation and keep your skin soft and moisturized with Aloe Vera, Gotu Kola (contains Asiatic acid an anti-inflammatory and collagen stimulating agent), and Vitamin E with powerful antioxidants that help protect your skin.

NON-DRYING FORMULA: To prevent dry skin from making things worse, we use an optimal blend of surfactants and humectants to give you a deep cleanse while preventing your skin from over drying. Hyaluronic acid helps the skin reduce moisture loss and gives your skin a soft after-feel.

RESULTS GUARANTEED: Not Happy? Contact us and we promise to make it right! 100% satisfaction or your money back. Made in the USA in a cruelty-free FDA inspected and cGMP/SOP compliant facility. No parabens, dyes, phthalates, sulfates, or drying alcohols.
